SELECT BOARDID as boardId, BOARDTYPE as boardType, BOARDTITLE as boardTitle, BOARDCONTENT as boardContent, BOARDNAME as boardName, BOARDDATE as boardDate, MEMNO as memNo, BOARDRECOMMENDCOUNT as boardRecommendCount FROM BOARD WHERE BOARDID = #{boardId}
